ComponentAnvils.title: Component Anvils
ComponentAnvils.description: Vi tosses you two component anvils.

GoldenGala.title: Golden Gala
GoldenGala.description: Annie changes all augments to gold tier this game.

GoldSubscription.title: Gold Subscription
GoldSubscription.description: Twisted Fate grants you gold every stage.

ScuttlePuddle.title: Scuttle Puddle
ScuttlePuddle.description: Neeko transforms all the monsters into crabs that drop bonus loot.

CrabRave.title: Crab Rave
CrabRave.description: Neeko transforms all the monsters into crabs that drop bonus loot, but crabs on Stage 5+ are SUPER DEADLY.

LootSubscription.title: Loot Subscription
LootSubscription.description: Urgot dredges you up some loot from a highly varied pool each stage.

ArtifactAnvil.title: Artifact Anvil
ArtifactAnvil.description: Zed gives you an Artifact Anvil.

PrismaticParty.title: Prismatic Party
PrismaticParty.description: Zac's virus turns all the augments Prismatic.

PrismaticPrelude.title: Prismatic Prelude
PrismaticPrelude.description: Aurora swaps the first augment to prismatic this game.

PrismaticFinale.title: Prismatic Finale
PrismaticFinale.description: Aurora swaps the last augment to prismatic this game.

TrainerGolems.title: Trainer Golems
TrainerGolems.description: Garen programs a Golem with 3 Emblems attached.

HackGolemArmory.title: HACK: Golem Armory
HackGolemArmory.description: Pick a Golem unit with 1 of 3 combat roles at the end of stage 4!

HackEggArmory.title: HACK: Egg Armory
HackEggArmory.description: Pick an egg with 1 of 3 hatching times at the start of Stage 4!

HackLuckyShops.title: HACK: Lucky Shops
HackLuckyShops.description: Once per stage, a lucky shop tailored to your traits can appear!

HackTwoStarShops.title: HACK: Two-Star Shops
HackTwoStarShops.description: Two-star units can appear in your shop!

HackAugmentRoundSwap.title: HACK: Augment Round Swap
HackAugmentRoundSwap.description: The augment rounds have been moved earlier this game.

HackFourthAugment2.title: HACK: Fourth Augment
HackFourthAugment2.description: There will be an extra augment round in stage 2!

HackFourthAugment3.title: HACK: Fourth Augment
HackFourthAugment3.description: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 3!

HackFourthAugment4.title: HACK: Fourth Augment
HackFourthAugment4.description: There will be an extra augment round at the end of stage 4!

HackFourthAugment5.title: HACK: Fourth Augment
HackFourthAugment5.description: There will be an extra augment round at the start of stage 5!

HackTreasureArmory.title: HACK: Treasure Armory
HackTreasureArmory.description: The Stage 4 NPC round is replaced with a rerollable Treasure Armory!

HackRerollSubscription.title: HACK: Reroll Subscription
HackRerollSubscription.description: Twisted Fate grants you free Shop rerolls every stage.

HackUpgradedStart.title: HACK: Upgraded Start
HackUpgradedStart.description: Garen upgrades your opening champion to be a 2-star 2-cost.

HackSplittersGalaxy.title: HACK: To Split or Not to Split
HackSplittersGalaxy.description: After every Carousel round, players choose how to split a pool of gold.

HackThreeChampions.title: HACK: Three Champions
HackThreeChampions.description: Start the game with a two-star 2-cost champion. Every player gets a unique one.

HackInvested.title: HACK: P0T 0F G0LD
HackInvested.description: After every Carousel round, players vote to split a pot of gold or increase the pot.
